title: Note 5 Unboxing / To Note Or Not?
description: Samsung Galaxy Note 5 -  Subscribe -  dbrand skins -   Welcome to my unboxing and overview of the Samsung Galaxy Note 5. The Galaxy Note 5 features a 5.7-inch QHD display and of course the latest incarnation of Samsung's S Pen. So what do you say? To Note or not?
